markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enticing Dwelling](/Feats.aspx?ID=3458) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 23</row>

**Archetype** [Exorcist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=171)

**Prerequisites**
[Exorcist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3454)

</column>

---

Your _spirit dwelling_ is particularly inviting to spirit wisps. During your daily preparations, and whenever you spend 10 minutes to find more wisps, you entice two wisps into your _spirit dwelling_ instead of one.
name: Enticing Dwelling
